title: Application Launch Regression
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user has a fresh install of Beat the Streak

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the app launcher icon is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN splash screen should load
AND the Beat the Streak logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the splash screen finishes displaying
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Login screen is displayed
THERE should be links to 'Official Rules', 'Terms and Conditions' and 'Privacy Policy'
THERE should be Email and Password fields
THERE should be a Sign In button
THERE should be links for "Need an MLB.com account?" and "How To Play"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'Official Rules' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is brought to the Official Rules web page.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'Terms and Conditions' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is brought to the Terms and Conditions webview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'Privacy Policy' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is brought to the Privacy Policy webview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on How To Play
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  the user is taken to the How to Play section of the app and Frequently Asked Questions are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps Sign In button without entering email or password
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message pop's up saying "Email cannot be empty" or "Password cannot be empty".

title: Login/Register Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a fresh install of Beat the Streak
AND the user has a MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters an invalid Email / Password combination and taps Sign In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Invalid email/password combination."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user leaves the email field blank and taps Sign In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Email cannot be empty."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters an email but leaves the password field blank and taps Sign In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Password cannot be empty."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters a valid email and password combination and taps Sign In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will log in and be brought to the My Picks section, if this is the first launch they will also be prompted with the choice to turn on push notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "Need an MLB.com account?" link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is brought to the Register page and will see:
- Email Address text Field
- Nickname text Field
- Password text field
- Confirm Password text field
- Birthday field
- 'Register' button
- 'Already have an MLB.com account?' link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user leaves all fields being left blank and taps Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Email cannot be empty."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters an email, leaves the remaining fields blank and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Nickname must be entered."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters an email and nickname, leaves the remaining fields blank and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Password cannot be empty."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters an email, nickname and password but leaves the remaining fields blank and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Confirmation password cannot be empty."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters all fields but leaves birthday blank and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "Birthday must be in the format mm/dd/yyyy."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters all fields but sets birthday to a date later than October 1st, (SEASON YEAR - 18) and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "You must be 18 years or older to sign up for an MLB.com account."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters all fields but chooses an email that has already been registered and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "An account with this email or nickname already exists."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters all fields but chooses a nickname that has already been registered and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message appear "An account with this email or nickname already exists."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters all fields correctly and taps the Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is signed in successfully and is brought to the My Picks section

title: My Picks Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed the "Beat The Streak Application"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND is logged into the "Beat the Streak" Application

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects My Picks from the navigation menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following sections will display on the My Picks tab:
- The navigation dropdown will be in the upper left corner
- The logged in user's streak will appear in the top right corner
AND dates will be listed on the left
AND where there is a single pick listed
- The option to double down is listed under the single pick
OR where there is no pick
- The option to 'Make a Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls up from the current date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a user who has previously made picks will be able to see earlier pick results from the season, 
for the dates where they did not select a player they will see "No Pick"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Make a Pick'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "MAKE A PICK" section opens and the user will see 4 sections accessible:
Top Picks| My Recent | Custom | All Players | 
The user will be on the Top Picks section by default

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Top Picks section (either by landing here by default or by swiping or tapping the text in the header)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see rows of up to 4 Player choices suggested by MLB.com that still have not locked for the day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the My Recent section by swiping or tapping the text in the header
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see rows of up to 10 Player choices that had previously been chosen by the current user sorted by the most recent at the top. Players in this view will only appear if they have a game scheduled for the selected day 
AND the game has not locked.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Custom Tab
AND toggles the categories on or off
AND taps Apply or Reset
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the Custom Filter Tab
AND the user will reach a page with filtered results yielding players that fall within the specific category OR the user will see a no result screen yielding zero results.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the All Players section by swiping or tapping the text in the header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a list of all the teams scheduled to play on the selected day that have not yet locked (teams that have begun to play their game for that date will no longer appear in this list)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a team from the All Players section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a list of the active players on that teams roster

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a player
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a popup will appear so the user can confirm their selection, if the user cancels the submit pick dialog, then they will return the to list they are currently viewing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a player and confirms the submit pick dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will return to the My Picks list with the player selected appearing for the date they were chosen. The player will appear with:
-their mugshot
-their opponent (preceded by VS for home or @ for away)
-the probable starting pitcher if available with the pitcher's ERA in parentheses
-and the lock time before the user will be unable to change their selection
-finally under the selected player there will be an available pick slot labeled "Double Down"/"Pick a second player on the same date"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a player from any of the available options 'Top Picks', 'My Recent', 'All Players'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the player will be shown as the selected pick for the chosen date regardless of which section they were listed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user makes a pick for a player on a date in the future (not Today's date)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player will be shown as the selected pick for the chosen date

Test for Top, Recent and All Players

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps on Double Down option for a date where they have already made a pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN if this the first time the user is trying to double down a message will appear:
"Want to Double Down?
Pick two players on any day to try to grow your streak by two.
But it's risky - if either player fails to get a hit, your streak will go back to ZERO."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps on Double Down option for a date where they have already made a pick and have used Double Down feature already
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the typical Make a Pick section is displayed complete with Top Picks, My Recent and All Players

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user makes another player pick for the same date to Double Down
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the confirmation dialog 
AND upon acceptance the user will see their second player appear in the 'My Picks' list. 
AND all of the additional pick information will display correctly (player name, mugshot, opponent, probable starter). AND confirm that the pick lock time will automatically adjust to whichever pick has the earliest team start time.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts to pick the same player for the same game and date as their Double Down choice (i.e. not a double header)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message that this is a duplicate pick for the selected date and the player will not be added to the My Picks list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user picks the same player for the same date but a different game (i.e. the player's team is scheduled for a double header)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be able to successfully add the player as their Double Down selection

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a player listed in their My Picks that has not locked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Pick Details view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Pick Details view and taps on Remove Pick button and confirms the popup confirmation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is returned to the My Picks list and the previously selected pick is no longer shown, the user will now see 'Make a Pick' for the date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user removes their pick on a date where they have opted to Double Down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be able to individually remove each of their picks, removing one or the other should leave the other pick unchanged. The only change that may occur is the lock time will update to the start time of the remaining selected pick if the player's teams had different start times.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user removes a Double Down pick of the same player on the date of a double header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be able to individually remove each of their picks of that player, removing one or the other should leave the other pick unchanged

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user checks their My Picks page when their pick for the day has locked but not yet been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see 'Pick locked' for that row under the versus information

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user checks their My Picks page when their pick for the day has locked but not yet been scored 
AND they have only made one pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not see the option to Double Down for the date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user checks their My Picks page when all teams for that day have been locked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see 'No Pick' for that date

title: Pick Scoring Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has 'Beat The Streak' application installed
AND the user has an existing MLB.Com Account
AND the user has logged into 'Beat the Streak' before

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user makes a pick that records a hit
AND the game has been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will increase from 0 to 1 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user makes a pick that does not record a hit
AND the game has been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will remain at 0 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a streak greater than 0 makes a pick that does not record a hit
AND the game has been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will return to 0 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a streak greater than 0 makes a single pick that does not get an official at bat
AND the game has been completed and scored.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak will remain at where it had been at the start of the day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a streak greater than 0 does not make any picks
AND the games for the day have all been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak will remain at where it had been at the start of the day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user makes a Double Down pick 
AND both players record a hit
AND the games have been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will increase from 0 to 2 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user makes a Double Down pick
AND only one player records a hit
AND the other does not
AND the games have been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will return to 0 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user makes a Double Down pick and neither player records a hit
AND the games have been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will remain at 0 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a streak greater than 0 makes a Double Down pick 
AND neither player records a hit
AND the games have been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will return to 0 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user makes a Double Down pick
AND one player records a hit 
AND the other does not have an official at bat
AND the games have been completed and scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will increase by 1 
AND it will be displayed in the 'Streak' circle in the top right of the app

title: Follow Live in At Bat Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has "Beat The Streak" installed
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into the "Beat the Streak" application

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the user taps on the picked player cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a pregame state in the At Bat App
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken to the game preview game day screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has no yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a live state in the At Bat Application
AND the user is a Lite user in At Bat.
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken into GameDay
And straight into the boxscore tab for the picked player's game.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a live state in the At Bat Application
AND the user is a Full user in At Bat.
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to the At Bat Application.
AND the user should be taken into GameDay and straight to the game tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a Final state in the At Bat app
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken into GameDay 
AND straight to the Wrap tab for the picked player's game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has been scored in BTS
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to a scoring breakdown of the player
AND each of the Innings where the player was at bat will display
AND the Pitcher at the time will be listed
AND the At Bat result will be listed
AND the Follow in At Bat will be listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user does not have At Bat Installed
AND the user taps on a player row
OR taps on view next on a player row
AND pick result page is opened for that player
AND tap on Follow in At Bat button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they user sees a Get At Bat Go download At Bat from the app store prompt
AND Cancel button
AND Continue button
AND Cancel caches the AT Bat redirection
AND Continue button brings you to At Bat page of the App Store

title: Pick Details Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into Beat the Streak 
AND has navigated to the Make a Pick list of player choices

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the "More" (three dots button) on a player row
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Player Detail Pick screen
AND will see the player on the left
AND the probable pitcher on the right (if available)
AND see the player's stats against the pitcher at the bottom (if available)
AND see the player's season stats
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Submit Pick'

All of the pitcher and batter information will be properly aligned in the tables

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the pitcher and batter information regarding the hand they throw with and side they bat from respectively
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see these values appear properly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the Pick Details for a batter who's opposing probably pitcher has not been determined
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the batters stats against that team instead of a specific pitcher 
AND the pitching hand is left blank with a dash "-"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a pick that has already been made from the My Picks view that is not yet locked
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see all of the same batter information and pitcher information (batter on left, the probable pitcher on right, player's stats against the pitcher, player's season stats) 
AND the button at the bottom will be 'Remove Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a Double Down pick that has already been made from the My Picks view that is not yet locked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the all of the same matchup information that a single pick would display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a pick that has already been made from the My Picks view that is not yet locked but there is no available probable pitcher information
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the batters stats against that team instead of a specific pitcher and the pitching hand is left blank with a dash "-"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a player 'More' button from Make a Pick or My Picks list where the player's team has a scheduled double header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see 'Game 1' or 'Game 2' on the Pick details view

title: Leaderboard Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has 'Beat The Streak' application installed
AND the user has an MLB account
AND the user has logged into 'Beat The Streak' application.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects Leaderboard from the navigation dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to the "{CurrentYear} Season" Leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes to the left on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Leaderboard will change from '{CurrentYear} Season' standings to the '2018 Season' standings
AND swiping again will change the Leaderboard from '2018 Season' to 'Batting Average'
AND swiping again will change the Leaderboard from 'Batting Average' to 'Pick Average'
AND swiping again will change the Leaderboard from 'Pick Average' to 'BTS All Time'
AND swiping again will change the Leaderboard from 'BTS All Time' to 'All Time Hit Streak'
AND swiping again will change the Leaderboard from 'All Time Hit Streak' to 'Friends'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes to the Current Season Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes to 2018 Season standings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standing will appear for the 2018 Season
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes to Batting Average
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standing will appear for the Batting Average
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Avg Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes to Pick Average
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standing will appear for the Pick Average
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Avg Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the 'BTS All Time' Overall Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for all BTS seasons
AND the list of users will appear in Season Streak Descending order
AND the year of the streak will be displayed
AND the current logged in user's best streak stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the 'All Time Hit Streak' Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a list of MLB players will appear
AND the list will show the each player's longest hit streaks
AND the list will be sorted by Hit Streak Descending order
AND the team the player was on at the time will be displayed
AND the year the streak occurred will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Groups Leaderboard and has no groups created
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no leaderboard will display
AND the following message will display: "This leaderboard is unavailable. Create groups by selecting the Groups tab in the Navigation menu. Press the + button to create/join a group"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Groups Leaderboard and is a member of at least one group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of the user's group's standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of players will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above group's standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Groups Leaderboard and is a member of multiple groups
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Group Name should appear above the user's stats
AND tapping on it will provide a picklist of other Groups the user is a member of
AND choosing a different group will update the list accordingly
AND the list of the user's group's standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of players will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above group's standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Share icon to the right of the navigation header
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the appropriate share options for the Android device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on an app from the Share menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will start the flow the selected app with pre-populated text that will share Beat the Streak:
"Play Beat the Streak. You can download it here: {Link to Google Play store page}"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the 'Friends' Leaderboard
AND the user is logged in with Facebook
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of the user's Facebook friends' standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of players will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above Friends' standings

title: Settings/Misc Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has 'Beat The Streak' application installed
AND the user has logged into 'Beat The Streak' application.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects Settings from the navigation menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the settings section

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user checks the Results checkbox under Notfications
AND the user checks the Reminders checkbox under Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will receive notifications for Results
AND the user will receive notifications for Reminders

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user uncheck the Results checkbox under Notifications
AND the user uncheck the Reminders checkbox under Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not receive any notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the Sign Out button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is brought to the Login screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the Facebook Log Out button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user disconnects their Facebook account from their profile in Beat the Streak.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps any of the following links:
How to Play
Prizes
Official Rules
Terms and Conditions
Privacy Policy
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be taken to a web view of the corresponding subject

title: Profile Page Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has 'Beat The Streak' application installed
AND the user has a MLB.com profile
AND the user has logged into 'Beat The Streak' application

For help generating prizes and badges on QA:
QA Badge Generator
http://atb-admin.qa.mlbam.net/engage/awardBadge

Get the user guid from accessing BTS Profile while connected to Charles. Create unique reference id for each badge generation. Select the badge desired and it should show up in app shortly after submitting.
*Please see attachment (How To Generate Badges in Beat The Streak) for more information*

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN at the top they should see their avatar and username

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the profile page and has previously made picks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN at the top the "Current Streak' and 'Season Long' streaks will be accurate

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the profile page and views their personal stats
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Pick, Pick Avg, Hits-ABs, Batting Avg should all be accurate

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the profile page and looks in the area below their stats
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see their 'Achievements' section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Achievements section or the 'See All' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be taken to the Achievements page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Achievement page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see Badges and Prizes as the headers and can swipe between the two views. 
AND in each of the views the badge and prize images appear correctly (check for colors and resolutions)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Achievement page and has earned a badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the earned badge will have a number overlaid on top of it with a counter of how many times that badge has been earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Achievement page and has not earned a prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a message "You'll earn a scratch-off card for each streak of 5, 10, 15, 20, etc. Reveal prizes ranging from tickets to MLB.TV to merchandise."

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Achievement page and has earned a prize (not yet claimed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the earned prize will appear with the respective streak achieved to earn it (e.g. Streak of 10) along with earned date and "Tap to Claim"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Achievement page, has an unclaimed prize and taps on the prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be taken to a webview where they are able to "scratch-off" and reveal a prize

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has claimed a prize and returns to their Achievement page in the Prize view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the earned prize will appear with the respective streak achieved to earn it (e.g. Streak of 10) along with earned date and the claimed date. The prize image will be "branded" with the text "CLAIMED"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has made at least 3 scored picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:

title: Push Notifications Regression
custom_preconds: GIVEN the 'Beat The Streak' application is on a fresh installation

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BTS on a fresh install
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should see a popup message asking if they want Push Notifications turned on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user agrees to turn on Push Notifications and then navigates to the Settings section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see that Reminders and Results notifications are checked off

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the checkbox next to Reminders and Results in settings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they should be able to toggle each type of notification on and off
AND in http://qa.mlb.com, there should be post calls for all notifications turned on
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting
AND each new notification request should send a new Post call.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has not made a pick for the day 
AND has Reminder alerts enabled in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will receive a push notification to make a pick for the day that morning or afternoon (time can vary around 10am to 12pm)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has not made a pick for the day 
AND has Reminder alerts disabled in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should not receive a push notification that they have not made a pick today

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has made a pick for the day
AND has Scoring alerts enabled in Settings 
AND one of their picks records a hit in a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).
Ex: Bot 3: Josh Donaldson hit a double.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has made a pick for the day 
AND has Scoring alerts enabled in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN after the game has completed and scored they should receive a push notification whether or not their pick recorded a hit or had no at bats. The notification will also give the user an update of their total streak or if it is now broken

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has made a double down pick for the day 
AND has Scoring alerts enabled in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN after the game for both picks have completed and scored they should receive a push notification whether or not their picks recorded a hit or had no at bats. The notification will also give the user an update of their total streak or if it is now broken

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has made a pick for the day 
AND has Scoring alerts disabled in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN after the game has completed and scored they should not receive any push notifications related to how their pick(s) performed

title: Mulligans Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 'Beat The Streak' application is installed
AND the user has a MLB.com account
AND the user has logged into 'Beat The Streak'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a pick that is not successful 
AND has a streak between 10 and 15 games but has NOT claimed their mulligan
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak is lost and reset to zero

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a new user (or any user that has not claimed their Mulligan) navigates to the Profile section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should see "Claim Now" underneath the 'Mulligan' text in the top right

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Claim now button on their Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is brought to a Mulligan webview 
AND a "Claim" button should be visible

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user leaves Mulligan webview without tapping the "Claim" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees their profile section again, they still have 'claim now' appear as their mulligan status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "Claim" button on the Mulligan web view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the button should disappear 
AND the user sees their profile section again, they will see "Expired" as their mulligan status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user that has UNCLAIMED their mulligan makes an unsuccessful pick before reaching a streak of 10
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak is lost and reset to zero

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user that has UNCLAIMED their mulligan makes an unsuccessful pick after passing a streak of 15
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak is lost and reset to zero

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user that has UNCLAIMED their mulligan makes an unsuccessful single pick while their streak is equal to or greater than 10 but less than or equal to 15
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will not be reset to zero, it will remain where it was at the start of that day
On the user's profile page their Mulligan status will change from "Unclaimed" to "Used"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user that has UNCLAIMED their mulligan makes an unsuccessful double down pick (only one selection gets a hit, the other does not OR both players don't get a hit) while their streak is equal to or greater than 10 but less than or equal to 15
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will not be reset to zero, it will remain where it was at the start of that day (it will not advance based on one of the picks getting a hit)
AND on the user's profile page their Mulligan status will change from "Unclaimed" to "Used"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views their pick results on My Picks and Recent Picks views after having used their mulligan
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN on the date the user's mulligan was triggered, the pick results will displayed with "Mulligan - Your Streak Is Saved"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user that has USED their mulligan makes an unsuccessful single pick while their streak is equal to or greater than 10 but less than or equal to 15
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak is lost and reset to zero

title: Creating/Editing Groups Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed 'Beat The Streak'
AND has an MLB.com Account
AND has logged into 'Beat The Streak' Application.
AND the user has navigated to the Groups view
AND is not part of a group

For more details and designs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=36733220

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps groups 
AND is not in any groups
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN groups Home default screen appears with a "Join or Create Group" button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Join or Create Group button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN group option action sheet appears with "Create a New Group" 
AND "Join an Existing Group"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the "+"(plus symbol) in the top right corner OR "Create a New Group" from the flyout menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN create New Group form appears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user leaves all fields blank and tap "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN message appears that group requires a name

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND leave Description empty 
AND set Private Off
AND tap's "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Group is created 
AND user receives a confirmation email (email will not be ready for 5.0)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in Group Name 
AND Description
AND set Private Off
AND Tap's "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is created 
AND user receives a confirmation email (this is to check that adding Description does not cause any issues)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND the description
AND set Private On. 
AND Tap's "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that private group requires a password

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND Description 
AND set Private On. 
AND Enter a password BUT leave the confirm password field blank
AND Tap "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that the passwords do not match

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user fills in only the Group Name, Description and set Private On. 
AND the user enters a password with a matching confirmation password
AND the user tap's "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is created 
AND user receives a confirmation email (email will not be ready for 5.0)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on a group created by the current user
AND tap's "Edit" from the Your Groups list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN group Edit form appears

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN on the Group Edit form
AND the user change's the group name. 
AND the user tap's "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is saved 
AND the new group name appears in user's Your Groups list

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND change's the Private setting to On. 
AND the user tap's "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN A message appears that a password is required

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND the user changes the Private setting to On. 
AND the user add's a password to the Password field BUT not to the confirm password field
AND the user tap's "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the message appears that the passwords do not match

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group 
AND the user changes the Private setting to On. 
AND the user adds matching passwords to the password and confirm password fields
AND the user tap's "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's group is saved as a private group (confirm by trying to join the group as another user)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a private group, 
AND the user changes the Private setting to Off 
AND the user tap's "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the group is saved as a public group (confirm by trying to join the group as another user)

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a different MLB.com account,

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken into BTS app with the join group form displayed and the password pre-populated. Confirming the dialog will successfully join the group and it is added to their groups list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps Email from the invite action sheet (an Email account has been setup on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a pre-composed message with a unique link inviting others to join the group appears in a compose email dialog

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user with a different MLB.com account,

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the secondary user is taken into BTS app, successfully joins the group and it is added to their groups list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user with a different MLB.com account, user follows the link from their email to join a private group
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the User is taken into BTS app with the join group form displayed and the password pre-populated. Confirming the dialog will successfully join the group and it is added to their groups list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps Email from the invite action sheet (an Email account has NOT been setup on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears for the user to setup email on the device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps Message from the invite action sheet (a Message account has been setup on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a pre-composed message with a unique link inviting others to join the group appears in a compose message dialog
Confirming the dialog will post the link to the intended message recipients for both public and private group types

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user with a different MLB.com account, user follows the link from a message to join a public group
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user is taken into BTS app, successfully joins the group and it is added to their groups list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user with a different MLB.com account, user follows the link from a message to join a private group
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken into BTS app with the join group form displayed and the password pre-populated. Confirming the dialog will successfully join the group and it is added to their groups list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps Message from the invite action sheet (a Message account has NOT been setup on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears for the user to setup messaging on the device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user taps any of the sharing options with enabled accounts but cancels the sharing flow
Facebook
Twitter
Email
Message
custom_steps_separated.expected:

No Facebook posts are posted for BTS
No Tweets are posted for BTS

And if it is Claimed, then it is grey scale BTS logo (orange background) with Claimed in red
And it has Earned Date and Claimed Date on separate lines with dates

title: Push Notification- Turn Notifications On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN The user has turned on Push Notifications
Either in the on boarding flow
OR
WHEN the user has gone to Settings and tapped on the Checkboxes
custom_expected:
THEN the notification should appear as "ON
AND in http://qa.mlb.com, there should be a POST call for all notifications turned on
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting.

title: Push Notifications- 1941 Notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"

AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
Please contact Wilsharo Scott on the services team to enable notifications and the frequency of the notifications.
Please download the debug build of the application.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has turned on News & Promotions Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should receive push notifications related to news and promotional offers within Beat The Streak.
(As of 04/2016 the only news & promotions users should see is related to Joe DiMaggio and what he did on each day of his streak, this will change)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has turned off News & Promotions Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not receive any notifications based on News & Promotions.

title: Push Notification- Reminders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN The user has turned on the "Pick Reminder" Alert in the on boarding flow
OR
The User has checked off the Reminders check box in the Settings Menu under the Notifications Section
custom_expected:
THEN in http://qa.mlb.com or http://qa2.mlb.com, there should be post calls for the notification
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting
AND in Push Setting it should show, [{"channels":{"channel.bts":{"events":["bts.reminder"]}}}]

title: Push Notification- Pick Hits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has notifications turned on
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Single in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Double in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Triple in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Home Run in a Live Game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).
Ex: 
Top 6: Pablo Sandoval hit a Single.
Bot 3: Josh Donaldson hit a Double.
Top 7: Jacoby Ellsbury hit a Triple.
Bot 8: Giancarlo Stanton hit a homerun.

AND in http://qa.mlb.com within Charles, there should be post calls for all notifications turned off
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting

title: Fast Track Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user does not have an MLB.com Account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the "Beat The Streak" application.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN after the splash screen, the user is taken to the login page to log in with an option available to create a new account.

IF in the offseason, a popup shows up that says, "Thanks for playing, Beat The Streak will return in [the next year]"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps "Need an MLB.com account?"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB.com register form will be displayed.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills out the form
AND taps the register button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is now registered to MLB.com
AND has an MLB.com account
AND will be redirected to My Picks.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Sign In
AND when the user fills out the form with valid credentials
AND the user taps on sign in.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is redirected to the Sign In page
AND the user is logged into the application
AND redirected to the My Picks page.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to make a pick
AND taps the "+"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will get redirected to the Make a Pick screen for the day
AND there should be 4 categories: Top Picks | My Recent | Custom | All Players
IF using a brand new user account, My Recent picks should be empty.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to select a player
AND taps the player in trending players
AND taps ok to submit pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player page
AND the player page will display stats versus the probably pitcher
IF there is no probable pitcher, the page will display player stats vs team.
AND the player page will display season stats.
AND there will be a pop up that asks "Submit Pick, Are you sure you want to submit your pick?"
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player appearing as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to select a player
AND taps the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there will be a popup that ask "Submit Pick, Are you sure you want to submit your pick?"
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player appearing as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Custom in the Make a Pick page
AND the user taps on a filters
AND the user taps on apply
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will get a list of picks that match the criteria of the filters.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Custom in the Make a Pick page
AND the user taps on a filters
AND the user taps on apply
AND the user taps on Reset
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should see the custom filters emptied
AND reset.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to remove the player before the players game is locked
AND taps view
AND taps remove pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player page
AND the player page will display stats versus the probably pitcher
IF there is no probable pitcher, the page will display player stats vs team.
AND the player page will display season stats
AND a pop up will occur when remove pick is tapped
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player removed as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to make a double down pick
AND already has a player selected for the day
AND taps double down
AND then taps a player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player categories 
AND there should be 4 categories: Top Picks | My Recent | Trending | All Players
AND a popup will appear and ask if the user wants to submit the pick
AND the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the two picks submitted for the day.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to remove a double down pick
AND the user has two players picked for the day
AND the user taps the player or edit next to the player
AND the user taps remove pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is redirected to the players page
AND then the user faces a pop up that ask if the user is sure they want to remove the player
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player removed as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the drop-down arrow on top
AND the user selects Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will open the side menu
AND the user will be redirected to the leaderboard page where there are 6 options
Current Streak (Current Year) | Season Streak (Current Year) | Batting Average | Pick Average |BTS All-Time |All-Time Hit Streak | Friends | Groups

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects any user
AND goes to friends 
AND tap's Facebook Connect
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the users profile page
AND IF the user has already connected to Facebook then the users friends on Facebook will appear
IF the user has not connected to Facebook then there will be a Facebook connect button
AND once the button is tapped the steps to connect to Facebook appear.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the top left hamburger
AND taps profile
AND taps see all next to achievements
AND taps see all next to recent picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the side menu opens up
AND the user gets redirected to the profile page
AND the user gets redirected to the Achievements page
AND on the achievements page there are two filters (Prizes | Badges)
AND recent picks will show all recent picks the user has made.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the top left hamburger
AND taps Groups
AND taps a group in the popular section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the side menu pops up 
AND the user is sent to the groups landing page
AND the user will be redirected to the group's page where on the top is the user stats and then below is the groups stats.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the "+" or Join or Create Group button
AND the user selects join an existing group
AND joins an open group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is shown a popup where it ask "Join An Existing Group" or "Create a new group"
AND the user is redirected to a search page where they can look for an existing group
IF the group is public then the user can join
IF the group is private then the user has to enter a password before joining.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the "+" or Join or Create Group button
AND the user selects create a new group

WHEN the user fills out the form
AND opts to make the group public
AND taps Create Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group will be made 
AND anybody can join the group (Confirm with a different MLB account)
AND the user is redirected to the groups page with the current created group on top

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills out the form
AND opts to make the group private
AND fills in a password and confirming that password 
AND taps Create Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group will be made
AND The user will be redirected to the groups page with the current group on top
AND if another user wants to join, they must put the password in to join the group (confirm with a different MLB.com account)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps into the group
AND taps the invite button on the top right
AND the user taps each option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the share pop up shows up with options to share the group; Facebook | Twitter | Email | Message
AND Facebook will open up a Facebook App Request popup that will show the users suggested friends to invite to BTS
AND Twitter will open a pop up and ask to post the link to BTS on your timeline.
AND Email will open a crafted email with the link to join BTS.
AND Message will open a crafted message with a link to join BTS.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the 3 dots next to the invite button in the group
AND taps Leave this Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a popup will appear that ask if you want to leave this group
IF the user select's leave this group, the user will be removed from the group and redirected to the groups page
IF the user select's cancel, the user stays on the group page.

title: User is able to Launch app successfully and all areas of the app are optimized
custom_preconds: ASSUMING a user has the Samsung Galaxy S8 or the Samsung Galaxy Note8 device
custom_steps: WHEN the user download and launches the Beat the Streak app
custom_expected:
THEN the app launches successfully and the all the areas of the app is optimized to support Samsung Galaxy s8 or the Note8 screen display
Verify the following areas:
- The splash screen is displayed fully and optimized edge to edge
- Log In Screen
- Register Screen
- My pick page
- Leaderboard page
- Groups page
- Contests page
- Profile page
- Contacts us page
- Official rules page
- Prizes page
- Tutorial page
- FAQ's page
- Settings page
